_header: He that is dear and buried in sight
_description: Prophecia Bridelyngton, Banistor, Merlyn and Thomas Assheldon

NLWPen50.First Lines: …He that is ded and buried in syght…
NLWPen50.Last Lines: …And in the vale of Josaphath men shall hym bor
NLWPen50.Note: First 16 lines illegible because of reagent stains
